meta.title: 1970s Occult
meta.description: Counterculture mysticism meets cosmic consciousness. Zodiac paperback covers, psychedelic earth tones, and the earnest spirituality of the Me Decade. Linda Goodman's Sun Signs energy.

typography.principle: Groovy meets mystical. Bold display faces with personality, warm body text that invites you in. Think zodiac book covers and album art.

font.name: Newsreader
font.usage: Body text - inviting and readable like a paperback

avoid.reason: Too cold and corporate for this mystical, warm aesthetic

color.principle: Earth tones meet cosmic mystery. Burnt oranges, harvest golds, avocado greens - grounded by deep purples and midnight blues that suggest the cosmos.

color.name: parchment
color.description: Aged paper cream - like a vintage paperback

motion.principle: Dreamy, flowing, slightly psychedelic. Like watching incense smoke or gazing at the stars. Nothing abrupt.

animation.name: cosmic-fade
animation.keyframes: from { opacity: 0; transform: scale(0.98); } to { opacity: 1; transform: scale(1); }

animation.name: orbit
animation.description: Slow rotation for decorative celestial elements
animation.keyframes: from { transform: rotate(0deg); } to { transform: rotate(360deg); }

animation.name: pulse-glow
animation.description: Subtle pulsing glow for mystical emphasis

animation.name: rise
animation.keyframes: from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(16px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }

pattern.name: zodiac-reveal
pattern.description: Unhurried reveal like stars appearing at dusk

backgrounds.principle: Textured and warm, suggesting aged paper and cosmic depth. Gradients welcome - think sunset skies and cosmic voids.

treatment.name: aged-paper
treatment.css: background: var(--parchment); background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noise'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noise)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E");
treatment.description: Paper texture like a vintage zodiac book

treatment.name: cosmic-gradient
treatment.description: Gradient suggesting the transition from earth to cosmos

treatment.name: sunset-glow
treatment.description: Warm glow from below like a horizon sunset

treatment.name: starfield
treatment.description: Dark cosmic background with stars - for dramatic sections

components.principle: Organic, rounded, mystical. Zodiac symbols, celestial ornaments, warm borders. Everything should feel like it belongs in a zodiac guidebook.

cosmic-card

celestial

layout.principle: Centered, contemplative, with room for the mystical. Like opening a zodiac guidebook - inviting you to discover your cosmic destiny.

spacing.note: Generous spacing creates a meditative feel

iconography.principle: Zodiac symbols are first-class citizens. Celestial imagery - suns, moons, stars, planets. Hand-drawn quality preferred over geometric precision.

special.zodiac-symbols: All 12 zodiac glyphs should feel era-appropriate
special.planet-symbols: Sun, Moon, Mercury, Venus, Mars should be prominent
